task.title: Installing Sametime Connect and Embedded clients on MacOS
task.shortdesc: This topic covers basic installation for the Sametime standalone client on MacOS.

context.p: Before getting started, it review the client installation customization options. Customizing the client can ease your deployment.

step.cmd: Decompress the client installation package into a temporary directory.
In the temporary directory, locate and double-click SETUP.EXE.
step.info: The installation process begins. When prompted, select the lanaguage to be displayed in the installation wizard windows.

step.cmd: From the Welcome screen, click Next.

step.info: To contine click I accept the terms in the license agreement and then Next.

step.cmd: On the next screen, specify where to install the client and then click Next.
step.info: The defalt value for the Install location is C:\HCL\Sametime Connect. You can select another location, you must remember it for future tasks.

step.cmd: Click Install to start the install process.
step.info: After the install is complete, click Finish.
